mapper.select: SELECT RESUME_ID, TITLE, CREATED_USER, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, MILITARY, ROLE, MARRIAGE, LANDLINE_NUMBER, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHOTO_PATH, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM profile
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile ( RESUME_ID, TITLE, CREATED_USER, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, MILITARY, ROLE, MARRIAGE, LANDLINE_NUMBER, PHONE_NUMBER, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHOTO_PATH, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{resumeId}, #{title}, #{createdUser}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{military}, #{role}, #{marriage}, #{landlineNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{address}, #{photoPath}, NOW(), NULL )
